    • insertionsort

      public static void insertionsort(Comparable[] array)
      Sorts an array in descending order using insertion sort algorithm. Sorts an array of objects that implement the Comparable interface.
      Parameters:
      array - The array to be sorted, containing objects the implement Comparable.

    • insertionsort

      public static void insertionsort(Object[] array, Comparator<Shape> c)
      Sorts an array in descending order using insertion sort algorithm. Uses a Comparator to compare Shape objects.
      Parameters:
      array - The array of Shape Objects to be sorted.
      c - The comparator used to compare between Two Shape objects.
